item.description:
After coming home from a busy day at work, and perhaps your wallet is stretched thin, you may be looking for just a quick, cheap, and simple, yet delicious, bite to eat.  Hence the "Cheap Eats" project dedicated towards finding great food within the Providence Metro Area at low cost.

A simple plan ... we'll meet up at the restaurant and order up.  Dining time will average around 2 hours, but anyone is welcomed to stay longer.  Seating and other amenities are determined on an individual basis, but don't be shy to warm up to any open seat with other Meetup members.  Always good to bring cash just in case, for some places don't take credit cards.

 

This month:  United BBQ

http://www.unitedbbq.com/home.php

Raved for it's pulled-pork sandwiches, sweet potato fries, and even vegan options with Seitan, the place has good reviews at prices below $10.  BBQ is not native to New England, but this place is as close as it can get and within local distance!  Seating will be limited at this venue, it's a small shack, but there is Captain Seaweeds right up the road where you can take your dinner to dine and get a drink at the same time.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll likely be wearing something Penn State related
item.name: Cheap Eats: United BBQ
